ud4.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava calikayam viharati calike pabbate.
ud4.1:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma meghiyo bhagavato upatthako hoti.
ud4.1:1.4: Atha kho ayasma meghiyo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho ayasma meghiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud4.1:2.1: Atha kho ayasma meghiyo pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya jantugamam pindaya pavisi.
ud4.1:2.2: Jantugame pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena kimikalaya nadiya tiram tenupasankami.
ud4.1:2.3: Addasa kho ayasma meghiyo kimikalaya nadiya tire janghaviharam anucankamamano anuvicaramano ambavanam pasadikam manunnam ramaniyam.
ud4.1:2.5: “pasadikam vatidam ambavanam manunnam ramaniyam. Alam vatidam kulaputtassa padhanatthikassa padhanaya.
ud4.1:2.6: Sace mam bhagava anujaneyya, agaccheyyaham imam ambavanam padhanaya”ti.
ud4.1:3.1: Atha kho ayasma meghiyo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud4.1:3.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma meghiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud4.1:4.1: “Idhaham, bhante, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya jantugamam pindaya pavisim.
ud4.1:4.2: Jantugame pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena kimikalaya nadiya tiram tenupasankamim.
ud4.1:4.3: Addasam kho aham, bhante, kimikalaya nadiya tire janghaviharam anucankamamano anuvicaramano ambavanam pasadikam manunnam ramaniyam.
ud4.1:4.7: Sace mam bhagava anujaneyya, agaccheyyaham imam ambavanam padhanaya’ti.
ud4.1:4.8: Sace mam, bhante, bhagava anujanati, gaccheyyaham tam ambavanam padhanaya”ti.
ud4.1:5.1: Evam vutte, bhagava ayasmantam meghiyam etadavoca:
ud4.1:5.2: “agamehi tava, meghiya, ekakamhi tava, yava annopi koci bhikkhu agacchati”ti.
ud4.1:6.1: Dutiyampi kho ayasma meghiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud4.1:6.2: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kinci uttari karaniyam, natthi katassa va paticayo.
ud4.1:6.3: Mayham kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaniyam, atthi katassa paticayo.
ud4.1:6.4: Sace mam bhagava anujanati, gaccheyyaham tam ambavanam padhanaya”ti.
ud4.1:6.5: Dutiyampi kho bhagava ayasmantam meghiyam etadavoca:
ud4.1:6.6: “agamehi tava, meghiya, ekakamhi tava, yava annopi koci bhikkhu agacchati”ti.
ud4.1:7.1: Tatiyampi kho ayasma meghiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud4.1:7.2: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kinci uttari karaniyam, natthi katassa va paticayo.
ud4.1:7.3: Mayham kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaniyam, atthi katassa paticayo.
ud4.1:7.4: Sace mam bhagava anujanati, gaccheyyaham tam ambavanam padhanaya”ti.
ud4.1:8.1: Atha kho ayasma meghiyo utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yena tam ambavanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam ambavanam ajjhogahetva annatarasmim rukkhamule divaviharam nisidi.
ud4.1:8.2: Atha kho ayasmato meghiyassa tasmim ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo papaka akusala vitakka samudacaranti, seyyathidam—
ud4.1:9.3: Saddhaya ca vatamha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita.
ud4.1:9.4: Atha ca panimehi tihi papakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvasatta, seyyathidam—
ud4.1:10.1: Atha kho ayasma meghiyo sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma meghiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud4.1:10.2: “idha mayham, bhante, tasmim ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo papaka akusala vitakka samudacaranti, seyyathidam—
ud4.1:10.6: Saddhaya ca vatamha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita.
ud4.1:10.7: Atha ca panimehi tihi papakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvasatta, seyyathidam—
ud4.1:11.1: “Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya panca dhamma paripakaya samvattanti.
ud4.1:12.1: Idha, meghiya, bhikkhu kalyanamitto hoti kalyanasahayo kalyanasampavanko.
ud4.1:12.2: Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya ayam pathamo dhammo paripakaya samvattati.
ud4.1:13.1: Puna caparam, meghiya, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno, anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
ud4.1:13.2: Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya ayam dutiyo dhammo paripakaya samvattati.
ud4.1:14.1: Puna caparam, meghiya, bhikkhu yayam katha abhisallekhika cetovivaranasappaya ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati, seyyathidam—appicchakatha, santutthikatha, pavivekakatha, asamsaggakatha, viriyarambhakatha, silakatha, samadhikatha, pannakatha, vimuttikatha, vimuttinanadassanakatha; evarupaya kathaya nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
ud4.1:14.2: Aparipakaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya ayam tatiyo dhammo paripakaya samvattati.
ud4.1:15.1: Puna caparam, meghiya, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati, akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
ud4.1:15.2: Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya ayam catuttho dhammo paripakaya samvattati.
ud4.1:16.1: Puna caparam, meghiya, bhikkhu pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
ud4.1:16.2: Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya ayam pancamo dhammo paripakaya samvattati.
ud4.1:16.3: Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya ime panca dhamma paripakaya samvattanti.
ud4.1:17.1: Kalyanamittassetam, meghiya, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa yam silava bhavissati, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharissati, acaragocarasampanno, anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhissati sikkhapadesu.
ud4.1:18.1: Kalyanamittassetam, meghiya, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa yam yayam katha abhisallekhika cetovivaranasappaya ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati, seyyathidam—appicchakatha, santutthikatha, pavivekakatha, asamsaggakatha, viriyarambhakatha, silakatha, samadhikatha, pannakatha, vimuttikatha, vimuttinanadassanakatha; evarupaya kathaya nikamalabhi bhavissati akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
ud4.1:19.1: Kalyanamittassetam, meghiya, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa yam araddhaviriyo viharissati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
ud4.1:20.1: Kalyanamittassetam, meghiya, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa yam pannava bhavissati, udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
ud4.1:21.1: Tena ca pana, meghiya, bhikkhuna imesu pancasu dhammesu patitthaya cattaro dhamma uttari bhavetabba—
ud4.1:21.2: asubha bhavetabba ragassa pahanaya, metta bhavetabba byapadassa pahanaya, anapanassati bhavetabba vitakkupacchedaya, aniccasanna bhavetabba asmimanasamugghataya.
ud4.1:21.4: anattasanni asmimanasamugghatam papunati dittheva dhamme nibbanan”ti.
ud4.1:22.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
